Property attribute for elements
Sets how it should be drawn in the editor

member.param: If TRUE ignores sources that are not playing
If TRUE ignores sources that are fading out

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipData.IsPlaying
member.summary: Returns TRUE if this clip is currently playing

member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipGUIMode
member.summary: Display mode used when drawing objects in a custom editor. Public so it can be serialized for advanced editors.

member.name: F:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipGUIMode.ClipOnly
member.summary: 1 row > AudioClip only

member.summary: 1 row > AudioClip and GroupId

member.summary: 1 row > AudioClip and play/stop buttons

member.summary: 1 row > AudioClip, GroupId and play/stop buttons

member.summary: 2 rows > AudioClip, GroupId, Volume, play/stop buttons

member.summary: 2 rows > AudioClip, GroupId, Volume, play/stop/loops buttons

member.name: F:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipGUIMode.FullNoGroup
member.summary: 3 rows > All options except GroupId

member.name: F:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipGUIMode.Full
member.summary: 3 rows > All options

member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioCollection
member.summary: A collection of audio files. Still needs to be completed.

member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup
member.summary: Audio group, connected to an AudioMixerGroup. Create it using the DeAudioManager Inspector

member.name: F:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.maxSources
member.summary: Max AudioSources for this group. DO NOT change this at runtime

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Play(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipData,System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary:
Plays the given with the stored volume, pitch and loop settings (unless set otherwise).
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Play(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Plays the given sound with the given options.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.PlayFrom(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipData,System.Single,System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary:
Plays the given sound with the stored volume, pitch and loop settings (unless set otherwise).
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.PlayFrom(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Plays the given sound with the given options from the given time.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Stop
member.summary: Stops all sounds for this group

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Stop(UnityEngine.AudioClip)
member.summary: Stops all sources for this group that are using the given clip

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.StopAllPaused
member.summary: Stops all sounds for this group that are in a paused state

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Pause
member.summary: Pauses all sounds for this group

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Pause(UnityEngine.AudioClip)
member.summary: Pauses all sources for this group that are using the given clip

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Resume(System.Single)
member.summary: Resumes all paused sounds for this group
member.param: If >=0 also sets the group volume, otherwise leaves as it was

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Resume(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single)
member.summary: Resumes all paused sources for this group that are using the given clip
member.param: If >=0 also sets the volume for the sources resuming the clip, otherwise leaves as it was

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.ChangePitch(System.Single)
member.summary: Changes the pitch for all existing sources of this group

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.ChangeRealPitch(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the real pitch of all sources for this group (ignoring targetPitch modifiers).
member.param: If TRUE also sets this pitch as the new targetPitch for each source

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.SetVolume(System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the volume for this group (same as setting directly)

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.SetVolume(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the volume for all sources in this group that are using the given clip

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Unlock
member.summary: Unlocks all instances for this group

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Unlock(UnityEngine.AudioClip)
member.summary: Unlocks all instances for this group that are using the given clip

member.summary: Fades this group's volume to the given value

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Crossfade(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipData,System.Single,System.Boolean,DG.DeAudio.FadeBehaviour,DG.Tweening.TweenCallback)
member.summary:
Fades out then stops all sources in this group, while starting the given with a fade-in effect.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup.Crossfade(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,System.Single,System.Boolean,DG.DeAudio.FadeBehaviour,DG.Tweening.TweenCallback)
member.summary:
Fades out then stops all sources in this group, while starting the given clip with a fade-in effect.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: F:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroupId.INTERNAL_Global
member.summary: Don't use/assign this! It's assigned automatically to the global group

member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager
member.summary:
Global AudioManager. Only use its static methods.
Must be instantiated only once per project (either manually or via code), and its GameObject is set automatically to DontDestroyOnLoad.

member.name: F:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.inspectorUpdater
member.summary: Used internally inside Unity Editor, as a trick to update DeAudioManager's inspector at every frame

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.Init
member.summary:
Creates a DeAudioManager instance (if it's not present already) and sets it as DontDestroyOnLoad. Returns TRUE if the initialization is successful, FALSE otherwise.
Use this method if you want to use DeAudioManager without setting up any DeAudioGroup. Though the recommended way is to create a prefab with the required settings and instantiate it once at startup.

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.Init(System.String)
member.summary: Instantiates the DeAudioManager prefab at the given Resources path (if it's not present already) and sets it as DontDestroyOnLoad. Returns TRUE if the initialization is successful, FALSE otherwise.

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.Init(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroup[])
member.summary: Creates a DeAudioManager instance (if it's not present already), sets it as DontDestroyOnLoad, and sets it with the given groups. Returns TRUE if the initialization is successful, FALSE otherwise.

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.Play(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipData,System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary:
Plays the given on the stored group, with the stored volume, pitch and loop settings (unless set otherwise). A with the given ID must exist in order for the sound to actually play.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.Play(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroupId,UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Plays the given sound with the given options and using the given group id. A with the given ID must exist in order for the sound to actually play.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.Play(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Plays the given sound external to any group, using the given options.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.PlayFrom(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipData,System.Single,System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Single},System.Nullable{System.Boolean})
member.summary:
Plays the given on the stored group, with the stored volume, pitch, loop settings (unless set otherwise), and from the given time. A with the given ID must exist in order for the sound to actually play.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.PlayFrom(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioGroupId,UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Plays the given sound with the given options, using the given group id, and from the given time. A with the given ID must exist in order for the sound to actually play.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioManager.PlayFrom(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Plays the given sound external to any group, using the given options and from the given time.
Returns the instance used to play, or NULL if the clip couldn't be played

member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioNotificator
member.summary: Static event notificator for all DeAudio events

member.name: T:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource
member.summary: Data connected to every AudioSource added by

member.name: F:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.locked
member.summary: If TRUE, the AudioSource won't be reused until it's unlocked

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.isFree
member.summary: TRUE if the audioSource is not playing and is not locked

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.isPaused
member.summary: TRUE if the clip was playing and has been paused - FALSE if it was/is stopped

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.isFadingOut
member.summary: TRUE while the source is fading out towards 0. Sources that are fading out are ignored when calling a DeAudioGroup Fade tween

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.targetVolume
member.summary:
Target volume set when a clip starts playing.
Setting volume to 1 will actually set it to this value (plus group and global modifiers).

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.unscaledVolume
member.summary: Unscaled volume (doesn't include modifiers caused by global, group and target volumes)

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.volume
member.summary:
Getter returns current audioSource.volume (which is influenced by global, group and target volumes).
Setter automatically applies scale factors (target, audioGroup and global volumes)

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.targetPitch
member.summary:
Target pitch set when a clip starts playing.
Setting pitch to 1 will actually set it to this value (plus group and global modifiers).

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.unscaledPitch
member.summary: Unscaled pitch (doesn't include modifiers caused by targetPitch)

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.pitch
member.summary:
Getter returns current audioSource.pitch (which is influenced by targetPitch).
Setter automatically applies scale factors (targetPitch)

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.SetTargetVolume(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Changes the with options to keep the current real volume the same
member.param: If TRUE adapts the current volume so that the actual volume output will be the same it was before calling this method

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.SetRealPitch(System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the real pitch of the AudioSource (ignoring targetPitch modifiers).
member.param: If TRUE also sets this pitch as the new targetPitch

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.Play(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipData)
member.summary: Play the given clip with the stored volume, pitch and loop settings. Calling Play directly from a DeAudioSource overrides any lock that might've been set (though the locked status won't change)

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.Play(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Play the given clip with the given options. Calling Play directly from a DeAudioSource overrides any lock that might've been set (though the locked status won't change)

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.PlayFrom(DG.DeAudio.DeAudioClipData,System.Single)
member.summary: Play the given clip with the stored volume, pitch and loop settings. Calling Play directly from a DeAudioSource overrides any lock that might've been set (though the locked status won't change)

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.PlayFrom(UnityEngine.AudioClip,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Play the given clip with the given options from the given time. Calling PlayFrom directly from a DeAudioSource overrides any lock that might've been set (though the locked status won't change)

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.Pause
member.summary: If the source was actually playing something, pauses it and returns TRUE, otherwise returns FALSE

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.Resume
member.summary: Resumes playing if paused

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.Stop
member.summary: Stops any sound connected to this source

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.StopIfPaused
member.summary: If this source was paused, stops any sound connected to it

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.Seek(System.Single)
member.summary: Sends this source's clip to the given time position

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.SeekPercentage(System.Single)
member.summary: Sends this source's clip to the given percentage position, 0 to 1 (but beware: 1 can't be seeked because it's the end of the clip), and returns the actual time position where the source went.

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.FadeOut(System.Single,System.Boolean,DG.DeAudio.FadeBehaviour,DG.Tweening.TweenCallback)
member.summary: Fades out this source's volume

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.FadeIn(System.Single,System.Boolean,DG.Tweening.TweenCallback)
member.summary: Fades in this source's volume

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.FadeTo(System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,DG.Tweening.TweenCallback)
member.summary: Fades this source's volume to the given value

member.name: M:DG.DeAudio.DeAudioSource.FadeFrom(System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean,DG.Tweening.TweenCallback)
member.summary: Fades this source's volume from the given value to its current one

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.Events.DeAudioEventArgs.type
member.summary: Type of event

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.Events.DeAudioEventArgs.audioGroup
member.summary: Eventual involved in the event (can be NULL)

member.name: P:DG.DeAudio.Events.DeAudioEventArgs.source
member.summary: Eventual involved in the event (can be NULL)
